item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP Soldiers Annunciacçâo, Mario Silva and Vidal on patrol in the shanty town of Sao Carlos, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, March 7, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF24mm f/1.4L II USM lens; the exposure was 1/160sec at f/1.4, ISO 2000.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: A night view of the front side of the shanty town of Rocinha, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, December 4, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF70-200mm f/2.8L IS II USM lens at 115mm; the exposure was 10secs at f/6.3, ISO 200.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP soldier Octavio Sardiña interrogates the suspect of a rape attempt. Rossane A. the woman (left) who called the police identifies the aggressor while some neighbours witness the scene in the shanty town of Vidigal, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 18, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF24mm f/1.4L II USM lens; the exposure was 1/80sec at f/1.6, ISO 3200.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP soldiers Clayton Batinga (left) and Dos Santos (right), in the back of a Police car while patrolling in the favela of Vidigal, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 22, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 16mm; the exposure was 1/80sec at f/2.8, ISO 4000.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP Military Policemen wait for orders after an officer had been shot by gangs while on patrol in Sao Carlos, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, May 5, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF35mm f/1.4L USM lens; the exposure was 1/100sec at f/1.4, ISO 1600.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP soldier Barros searches several teenagers in an old "Boca de Fumo" (drug sales point), in the shanty town of Sao Carlos, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 25, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 35mm; the exposure was 1/60sec at f/2.8, ISO 3200.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP soldier Renata J. takes a break after a 12 hour shift in the shanty town of Vidigal, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 22, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF35mm f/1.4L USM lens; the exposure was 1/80sec at f/4.5, ISO 5000.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP soldiers Juliana Gomes, De Luca and Maia watch the surroundings and the beaches of Leblon and Ipanema from the top of the shanty town of Vidigal, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 13, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 16mm; the exposure was 0.5sec at f/2.8, ISO 2500.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP soldiers Fabiano Barros and Serrano, take a break to eat during a 12 hour long night patrol, in the shanty town of Sao Carlos, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 25, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF24mm f/1.4L II USM lens; the exposure was 1/200sec at f/2.2, ISO 2000.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: A youth jumps down a stairway with the word "peace" written on the wall, in the shanty town of Rocinha, the biggest slum of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 22, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 32mm; the exposure was 1/160sec at f/2.8, ISO 1600.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: View from the recently installed cableway in the group of shanty towns known as Complexo Alemao, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, April 29, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF24mm f/1.4L II USM lens; the exposure was 1/2000sec at f/1.4, ISO 125.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: Several teenagers play soccer in Rocinha, the biggest shanty town of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, November 26, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 16mm; the exposure was 1/500sec at f/3.2, ISO 2000.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: A young girl touches a painted wall in the shanty town of Rocinha, the biggest favela of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, November 4, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF50mm f/1.4 USM lens; the exposure was 1/1600sec at f/2.2, ISO 1600.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: Different indigenous ethnic groups dance in a ritual ceremony after a protest against the demolition of the Instituto del Indio building (Indian Institute), now abandoned and occupied by dozens of indigenous people in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, November 23, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 16mm; the exposure was 1/400sec at f/2.8, ISO 4000.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: A group of teenagers train by lifting weights while an old woman stares at them in the shanty town of Rocinha, the biggest favela of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, December 18, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF35mm f/1.4L USM lens; the exposure was 1/250sec at f/5.6, ISO 2000.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: Kids playing table tennis in the shanty town of Rocinha, the biggest slum of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, November 26, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 17mm; the exposure was 1/200sec at f/4.5, ISO 1600.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: The figure of the Corcovado Christ emerging from the afternoon fog, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, December 15, 2011. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF70-200mm f/2.8L IS II USM lens at 200mm; the exposure was 1/1250sec at f/8, ISO 800.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP soldier Franca, walks in front of a barber shop while its owner gives a haircut to a client, in the shanty town of Sao Carlos, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, March 15, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF35mm f/1.4L USM lens; the exposure was 1/160sec at f/2.2, ISO 320.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: A horse runs away from a Riot Police officer, while he patrols during the occupation of one shanty town who belongs to the group of slums called Complexo de Alemao, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, April 26, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF35mm f/1.4L USM lens; the exposure was 1/1000sec at f/4.5, ISO 320.

item.title: Rafael Fabrés
item.media:description: UPP Soldiers Queiroz, Neris, Ferreira and L.Guedes from the 2nd UPP of the 4th Military Police Battalion inspect the overview of the favela of Sao Carlos from a waste ground know as Larguinho, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, February 28, 2012. Taken on a Canon EOS 5D Mark II with an EF16-35mm f/2.8L II USM lens at 35mm; the exposure was 0.8sec at f/2.8, ISO 1600.
